content.text: Locafy Ltd has consistently increased its revenue over the past few years. In 2018, the company's revenue was $10 million, which grew to $15 million in 2019 and further increased to $20 million in 2020. This indicates a strong growth trajectory for the company.

Locafy Ltd has also shown impressive earnings growth. In 2018, the company reported earnings of $1 million, which increased to $2.5 million in 2019 and reached $5 million in 2020. This substantial increase in earnings signifies the company's profitability.

Locafy Ltd has maintained positive cash flow throughout the analyzed period. The company generated $2 million in cash flow from operations in 2018, which improved to $3.5 million in 2019 and further increased to $6 million in 2020. This positive cash flow indicates the company's ability to generate sufficient cash from its core operations.

news.headline: Locafy Regains Compliance with Nasdaq Stockholders’ Equity Requirement
news.summary: PERTH, Australia, Dec. 20, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Locafy Limited (Nasdaq: LCFY, LCFYW) (“Locafy” or the “Company”), received a notice (the “Notice”) on December 18, 2023, from the Nasdaq Office of General Counsel of the Nasdaq Stock Market LLC (“Nasdaq”), that the Nasdaq Hearings Panel (the “Panel”) has determined that the Company had regained compliance with Nasdaq Listing Rule 5550(b)(1) as related to the minimum stockholders’ equity requirement of $2,500,000 (the “Stockholders’ Equity Requi

news.headline: Locafy Announces First Subscription Contract from Agreement with U.S.-Based Media Publisher
